tagline: A news fact-checking tool designed for collaboration between publishers and readers (and world peace)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: We're just getting started! Project announcements at [@checkdesk](http://twitter.com/checkdesk). Also, you can follow Meedan on [Github](http://github.com/meedan), [Twitter](http://twitter.com/meedan) and [Facebook](http://facebook.com/meedan).
name: Checkdesk
